mapper.select: select b.boa_no, b.boa_name, u.usr_no as "userDTO.usr_no", u.usr_id as "userDTO.usr_id", u.usr_name as "userDTO.usr_name" from t_board b inner join t_user u on b.usr_no = u.usr_no where b.boa_status = 1 order by b.boa_name asc
select b.boa_no, b.boa_name, u.usr_name as "userDTO.usr_name", u.usr_id as "userDTO.usr_id" from t_board b inner join t_user u on b.usr_no = u.usr_no where b.boa_no = #{boa_no}

select a.art_no, a.art_title, a.art_regdate, a.art_readcnt, u.usr_id as "userDTO.usr_id", u.usr_name as "userDTO.usr_name" from t_article a inner join t_user u on a.usr_no = u.usr_no where a.boa_no = #{boa_no} order by a.art_no desc

select art_no, art_title, art_content, art_like, art_dislike, art_regdate, art_readcnt, art_com_cnt, art_ip, boa_no, usr_no as "userDTO.usr_no", usr_id as "userDTO.usr_id", usr_name as "userDTO.usr_name" from t_article inner join t_user using (usr_no) where art_no = #{art_no}
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(boa_no, boa_name, usr_no) values(seq_board.nextval, #{boa_name}, #{userDTO.usr_no})
insert into t_article(art_no, art_title, art_content, art_ip, boa_no, usr_no) values(seq_article.nextval, #{art_title},#{art_content}, #{art_ip}, #{boa_no}, #{userDTO.usr_no})
mapper.delete: delete from t_article where art_no = #{art_no} and usr_no = #{userDTO.usr_no}
mapper.select: select com_no, com_content, com_regdate, com_like, com_dislike ,com_ip, art_no, usr_no as "userDTO.usr_no", usr_id as "userDTO.usr_id" ,usr_name as "userDTO.usr_name" from t_comment c inner join t_user u using (usr_no) where art_no = #{art_no} order by com_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from t_comment where com_no = #{com_no} and usr_no = #{userDTO.usr_no}
